en.title: Cleaning Company Management System | PraticOS
en.description: Stop ghost employees! Cleaning business software with geolocation check-in, digital checklists and before/after photos. Track your team in real time.
en.keywords: cleaning company software, cleaning business management, janitorial service app, cleaning crew tracking, maid service software, cleaning service scheduling
en.ogDescription: Stop ghost employees! System with geolocation check-in, digital checklists and before/after photos. Track your team in real time.

hero.title: Stop ghost employees:
hero.titleHighlight: know where your team is in real time
hero.subtitle: Geolocation check-in, digital checklists for each service type and before/after photos to prove to the client. Automatic reports effortlessly.

problems.title: Do you face
problems.subtitle: Common pain points for cleaning business owners

items.title: Ghost employees
items.text: Employee clocks in but isn't at the location. You pay for work that wasn't done and lose client trust.

items.title: Don't know where the team is
items.text: Need to call each employee to know if they arrived at the client. Waste time and have no real control.

items.title: Client complaints about quality
items.text: Constant complaints about poor cleaning. Without defined standards, each employee does it differently.

items.title: Paper work orders
items.text: Paper forms get lost, torn or become illegible. At month's end, don't know how many services were done.

items.title: Can't prove the service
items.text: Client says cleaning wasn't done, but you don't have before/after photos to prove it.

items.title: Chaotic WhatsApp
items.text: Lost messages in groups, conflicting information and too much time spent coordinating via phone.

solutions.title: How
solutions.subtitle: Features designed for daily cleaning business operations

items.title: Geolocation check-in
items.text: Employee can only clock in when at the location.

items.title: Digital checklist by room
items.text: Task list for each room or area. Employee marks what was done and you track in real time.

items.title: Before and after photos
items.text: Mandatory visual documentation. Prove to the client the service was well done.

items.title: Automatic report for client
items.text: Client receives report with photos and filled checklist.

items.title: Real-time tracking
items.text: See where each employee is and the status of each service on the map.

items.title: Complete financial control
items.text: Know how much you billed, costs per service and real profit. Complete dashboard.

checklist.title: Cleaning checklist
checklist.text: Standardize service quality with specific checklists for each type of environment. Employee marks each completed task.

items.text: Photos before starting
Sweep and vacuum all areas
Clean surfaces and furniture
Sanitize bathrooms
Clean kitchen and appliances
Photos after finishing

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: Powerful and intuitive tools to boost your productivity

items.title: Digital WO
items.text: Create work orders with address, checklist and specific instructions for each client.

items.title: Before/After Photos
items.text: Document the location condition before and after cleaning. Prove service quality.

items.title: Geolocation
items.text: Know exactly where your team is. Check-in/check-out with verified location.

items.title: Financial Control
items.text: See how much you billed, received and have to receive. Complete dashboard.

items.title: Team Management
items.text: Track each employee's productivity. Complete service history.

items.title: Client Report
items.text: Send professional reports with photos and automatically filled checklist.

testimonial.quote: Before I had problems with employees clocking in but not going to the client. Now with geolocation check-in that problem is gone. And clients love receiving the report with photos.
testimonial.name: Carla Mendes

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
items.answer: No! The free plan is real and has no time limit. You can use it forever with up to 30 photos/month. Our pricing is transparent and you don't need to talk to a salesperson.

items.question: How does geolocation check-in work?
items.answer: The employee opens the app when arriving at the service location. The system automatically records the location, ensuring they are actually at the client's address.

items.question: Can I create different checklists for each type of cleaning?
items.answer: Yes! You can create specific checklists for residential, commercial, post-construction cleaning, etc. Each with tasks appropriate for that type of service.

items.question: Will my employees be able to use it?
items.answer: Absolutely! PraticOS was made to be as simple as using WhatsApp. If you know how to use a phone, you know how to use PraticOS.

items.question: Can the client see the report?
items.answer: Yes! You can send an automatic report with all photos and the filled checklist. The client receives it by email or WhatsApp.

download.title: Download now and start
download.text: Available for iOS and Android. Start free!

contact.title: Need
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you
